World Cup 2018 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Kazan has spent the decade since its 2005 millennium celebration reinventing itself as a Russian athletics capital, becoming a top host of world and European tournaments.
snippet: Kazan has spent the decade since its 2005 millennium celebration reinventing itself as a Russian athletics capital, becoming a top host of world and European tournaments.
